# Tender Announcement: EF997-241052 - Replacement of Electronic Systems at Kuujjuaq Airport
=========================

**Reference Number:** WS4291033703

**Publication Date:** November 3, 2023

**Closing Date:** December 7, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. (EST)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals for the replacement of electronic systems at Kuujjuaq Airport, located in Quebec, Canada.

**Project Overview:**
The proposed project involves the replacement of existing electronic systems at Kuujjuaq Airport. The work includes the installation of new communication systems, navigation equipment, and other related systems.

**Key Project Details:**

* **Procurement Category:** CNST
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive and open bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region)

**Eligibility:**

* Firms must be registered in the Supplier Registration Directory (SRD)
* Firms must be certified to operate in the field of communication system services

**Proposal Requirements:**

* A proposal that includes a comprehensive plan for the execution of the project
* A detailed description of the systems to be replaced and the new systems to be installed
* A complete breakdown of the cost estimate for the project

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Proposal quality and completeness
* Technical expertise and qualifications
* Pricing and cost estimate

**Contact Information:**

* Zanoun, Fahad (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [fahad.zanoun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:fahad.zanoun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
